title: Emory Day of Giving 2023
cleaned_text: The Emory Vaccine Center is the largest and most comprehensive academic vaccine research center in the world and has been at the forefront of the fight to develop new vaccines and treatments in record time. Presently, the Emory Vaccine Center has multiple studies underway focusing on several new vaccines, other drug treatments and better understanding the duration of natural immunity. The mission of the Emory Vaccine Center is to improve human health by conducting fundamental and clinical research leading to the development of effective vaccines against infectious and chronic diseases of global importance. Since its establishment in 1995, it has been an epicenter of vaccine research focused on vaccines for treatment and prevention of HIV/AIDS, Ebola, Zika, COVID-19 and others with more than 300 scientists researching, developing, and testing vaccines. This research has led to additional discoveries being used in cancer immunotherapy treatments, organ transplants and autoimmune diseases as our knowledge of the immune system increases.
